changeLogMessages: Update SDK to include `aws-chunked` in the `Content-Encoding` header when the [request payload is transferred in multiple chunks](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/sigv4-streaming.html)

Update `PutObject` and `UploadPart` requests to include the `Content-Encoding` header when the [request payload is transferred in multiple chunks](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/sigv4-streaming.html)
